short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access Cloud Storage Buckets in the Files App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple App for Chrome OS that showcases the chrome.fileSystemProvider API by giving you access to Cloud Storage Buckets directly in the Files.app.

Changelog:

0.2:
- Fixed files not showing in folders

0.1:
- Added multiple mounts feature

0.0.3:
- API Update.

0.0.2:
- Handle copy operation


For full details, go to https://github.com/beaufortfrancois/cloud-storage-chrome-app
